price: Pa i ako bi otrpjeli, njihovo boravište bit će Vatra; a ako budu tražili naklonost da se vrate, oni neće biti od onih koji će naklonost zadobiti.
arabic: فَإِن يَصۡبِرُواْ فَٱلنَّارُ مَثۡوٗى لَّهُمۡۖ وَإِن يَسۡتَعۡتِبُواْ فَمَا هُم مِّنَ ٱلۡمُعۡتَبِينَ

version.title: Bosnian Translation - Muhammad Mihanovich
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Muhammad Mihanovich, printed in 2013. some referred verses corrected by Supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation, and development.

meta.transliteration: fa-in yaṣbirū fal-nāru mathwan lahum wa-in yastaʿtibū famā hum mina al-muʿ'tabīna
